title: catwalk skin series (wip project)
body:
okay so ive had this idea for a while about a skin series that could involve alot of the characters of league of legends, basically its the league of fashion where most of the factions choose their best dressed to battle it out on the runway instead of the battlefield and this can also include rivals, like an example i want to make would be {{champion:127}}  and {{champion:22}} . other examples of the catwalk characters would include {{champion:55}} , {{champion:28}} , {{champion:8}} , {{champion:245}} , {{champion:126}} , {{champion:131}}   and {{champion:119}} 

but its not just the catwalkers, i thought about the critics, the ones who would judge them.
some examples ive thought would be {{champion:44}} , {{champion:202}} , {{champion:103}}  and {{champion:254}}  

so far ive only drawn up a rushed mock sketch for vladimir but i really want to make other examples for a lineup
i havent really planned out a story so if anyone has any ideas im open to suggestions, but so far i was thinking this is something that happens once a year  where most of runeterra puts down their knives and magics so they can compete in a battle for the best dressed, in this way they celebrate the differing fashions of the many cultures of runeterra and the one faction that wins ( this can mean anything from noxus or the shadow isles) gets to have a 3 skin lineup.
so far ive had the idea that katarina tries to cheat by drinking a beauty potion that singed gives her.

OH OH these were the songs i was listening to to get a feel for this idea
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5vebKoO__8A - gokusaishiki by - reol
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mgEixhE3Oms - dancing in the dark - by dev
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6_RGr6YBkb0 - mother brain - by mayhem vs klippa
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qqOc-Hi623k - limbo - by nhato

so what does everyone think? could this work? i might put up another post with the other (hopefully cleaned) ideas later down the track, even if this doesnt get considered im still going to explore this because i want to see how i can make a fresher look on the differeing fashions like ionia compared to bilgewater

replies.body:
I think it would be really cool to explore the Asian inspired Ionian fashion, maybe we could get stuff like [this](http://www.copypaste.am/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/4312612-350x400.jpg)?

Nice idea anyways, keep us updated if you develop it any further :)
oooo what about irelia with a nice flowery kimono or something, that is so cool though thank you so much
